derivation: from a presumed compound of G2095 (εὐδοκία) and the base of G1380 (εὐδοκία);
kjv_def: desire, good pleasure (will), X seem good
strongs_def: satisfaction, i.e. (subjectively) delight, or (objectively) kindness, wish, purpose
outline:
1. will, choice
    1. good will, kindly intent, benevolence
  2. delight, pleasure, satisfaction
  3. desire
    1. for delight in any absent thing easily produces longing for it
